name: European CIO Association
membership:
European Internet Foundation
European e-Skills Association
goal: To provide CIOs with European operations with means of sharing experiences and concerns among themselves, as well as raising key issues related to information society to the relevant bodies, regulatory and vendors. The association is structurally and financially independent from any vendor, government or any kind of vested interest representative group.
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market
Cyber Security
Cloud Computing
Software Licensing
Software Audit
